remarks: Numeration theorem: every set with a choice function on its power set is numerable.  With AC, this reduces to the statement that every set is numerable.  Similar to Theorem 10.3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 84. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1997.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2013.)
statement:
dfac8a $p |- ( A e. B -> ( E. h A. y e. ~P A ( y =/= (/) -> ( h ` y ) e. y ) -> A e. dom card ) ) $.
$d A h y $.
$d B h $.
